issue.title: [R] Bindings for strsplit
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
split_pattern is the C++ compute function name

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11515?focusedCommentId=17339047) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
The PR for this also implements `stringr::str_split`
